title: Annual Sports Day 2025
description: Our biggest sporting event of the year featuring track and field events, team sports, and inter-house competitions. Students will showcase their athletic prowess across various age groups.

title: Science Exhibition - Innovation Fair
description: Students from grades 6-12 will present their innovative science projects, experiments, and research work. Open to parents and the community.

title: Cultural Evening - Rhythm & Colors
description: An evening celebrating diverse cultures through music, dance, drama, and art performances by our talented students.

title: Parent-Teacher Conference
description: Individual meetings between parents and teachers to discuss student progress, achievements, and areas for improvement.

title: Inter-School Debate Championship
description: Hosting schools from across Jabalpur for a competitive debate championship on contemporary issues.

title: Admissions Open Day
description: Prospective students and parents are invited for campus tours, information sessions, and meetings with faculty and current students.
